statements: DELETE FROM influencer_profiles WHERE influencer_id = 101 AND follower_count > 10000;
DELETE FROM influencer_profiles WHERE engagement_rate < 0.05 OR influencer_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM influencer_history WHERE action = 'unfollow' AND event_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM influencer_profiles WHERE influencer_id = 500 AND follower_count < 10000;
DELETE FROM influencer_posts WHERE influencer_id = 1 AND post_timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM influencer_stats WHERE influencer_id = 2 AND post_count < 10;
DELETE FROM InfluencerComments WHERE commenter_name = 'John Smith';
